document.full_text: mass deaths of bee colonies in many parts of the world may be part of a wider, hidden threat to wild insect pollinators vital to human food supplies, a u.n. study indicated on thursday.
document.title: bee deaths may signal wider pollination threat: u.n.
lines_and_colors: mass deaths of bee colonies in many parts of the world may be part of a wider, hidden threat to wild insect pollinators vital to human food supplies, a u.n. study indicated on thursday.
